reviews.name: The A-Team (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: It tells the story of how they became the A-Team. In the tv show they were already well established. This is their beginning. And it's so much fun. I like the cameos at the end. Watch for them. If you don't expect the tv show, you should enjoy it too.
reviews.title: Not the TV Show

reviews.name: The A-Team (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Got this for Christmas. Watched only the theatrical version. It also has an unrated version, but I prefer the one with the least cussing in it. Murdock is totally hilarious as always!! Loved the helicopter stunt he pulled in the movie! They also did a tank stunt; both looked impossible.. but, that's part of a movie. lol Loved the movie.
reviews.title: Loved the A-Team & also throughout the 80s!!

reviews.name: The A-Team (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: It's not the old A-Team, so don't expect that. But taken on its own merits, it's hilarious. And, yes, they remembered to use the classic quote, "I love it when a plan comes together!"
reviews.title: The Old vs The New

reviews.name: The A-Team (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: MY son asked for this DVD for Christmas gift. In that it came in a very timely manner and he's happy, is all that matters.
reviews.title: Christmas gift

reviews.name: The A-Team (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: the movie is lots of fun,action,comedy,and one great con...I love it when a plan comes together.
reviews.title: entertaining
